lessons.title: Lesson 0 - Introduction
lessons.desc: Get started with Pinyin, tones, and Chinese pronunciation.

lessons.title: Lesson 1 - Tones
lessons.desc: Learn how Mandarin tones change meaning. Train your ear to recognize tone differences.

lessons.title: Lesson 2 - Greetings
lessons.desc: Learn common greetings and polite expressions. Understand how to greet and respond naturally.

lessons.title: Lesson 3 - Relationships
lessons.desc: Learn words for family members and relationships. Recognize how people are referred to in Mandarin.

lessons.title: Lesson 4 - Pronouns
lessons.desc: Understand personal pronouns and demonstratives. Learn how Mandarin refers to people and things.

lessons.title: Lesson 5 - Numbers 0–10
lessons.desc: Learn basic numbers from zero to ten. Build the foundation for counting and quantities.

lessons.title: Lesson 6 - Yes / No & Basics
lessons.desc: Learn basic sentence particles and responses. Understand simple questions and confirmations.

lessons.title: Lesson 7 - Polite Phrases & Needs
lessons.desc: Learn polite expressions and common needs. Understand how to ask and respond politely.

lessons.title: Lesson 8 - Days & Time
lessons.desc: Learn words for time, dates, and daily references. Understand how Mandarin talks about time.

lessons.title: Lesson 9 - Review & Self-Intro
lessons.desc: Review basic vocabulary through self-introduction. Understand simple personal information exchanges.

lessons.title: Lesson 10 - Colors & Descriptions
lessons.desc: Learn common colors and basic descriptions. Understand how objects are visually described.

lessons.title: Lesson 11 - Food & Drinks
lessons.desc: Learn names of common foods and drinks. Recognize everyday dining vocabulary.

lessons.title: Lesson 12 - Weather & Nature
lessons.desc: Learn words for weather and natural elements. Understand how nature is described in Mandarin.

lessons.title: Lesson 13 - Daily Activities
lessons.desc: Learn verbs for everyday actions and routines. Recognize common daily activities.

lessons.title: Lesson 14 - At the Market
lessons.desc: Learn vocabulary for shopping and prices. Understand basic market and buying terms.

lessons.title: Lesson 15 - Clothes & Shopping
lessons.desc: Learn clothing names and shopping expressions. Understand how items and sizes are described.

lessons.title: Lesson 16 - Transport & Directions
lessons.desc: Learn transport modes and direction words. Understand how movement and locations are expressed.

lessons.title: Lesson 17 - Review & Places
lessons.desc: Review common public places and locations. Understand everyday place-related vocabulary.

lessons.title: Lesson 18 - Describing People
lessons.desc: Learn words to describe people and appearance. Understand basic physical descriptions.

lessons.title: Lesson 19 - Feelings & Health
lessons.desc: Learn vocabulary for emotions and health. Understand how feelings and conditions are expressed.

lessons.title: Lesson 20 - Question Words
lessons.desc: Learn essential question words in Mandarin. Understand how information is asked for.

lessons.title: Lesson 21 - Numbers 11–100
lessons.desc: Learn larger numbers and counting patterns. Build confidence with quantities and amounts.

lessons.title: Lesson 22 - House & Rooms
lessons.desc: Learn words for rooms and household items. Understand basic home-related vocabulary.

lessons.title: Lesson 23 - School & Learning
lessons.desc: Learn vocabulary related to school and study. Understand common academic terms.

lessons.title: Lesson 24 - Technology
lessons.desc: Learn words for digital and modern technology. Understand basic tech-related vocabulary.

lessons.title: Lesson 25 - Review & Communication Skills
lessons.desc: Review communication-related verbs and actions. Strengthen understanding of everyday interactions.

lessons.title: Lesson 26 - Hobbies & Free Time
lessons.desc: Learn words for hobbies and leisure activities. Understand how free time is described.

lessons.title: Lesson 27 - At the Restaurant
lessons.desc: Learn dining and ordering vocabulary. Understand common restaurant expressions.

lessons.title: Lesson 28 - At the Market
lessons.desc: Learn shopping and pricing expressions. Understand everyday buying situations.

lessons.title: Lesson 29 - Travel & Hotel
lessons.desc: Learn travel and accommodation vocabulary. Understand common travel-related terms.

lessons.title: Lesson 30 - Emergency & Help
lessons.desc: Learn words used in emergencies and help situations. Understand urgent and safety-related expressions.

lessons.title: Lesson 31 - Making Plans
lessons.desc: Learn time-related words for planning. Understand how arrangements are discussed.

lessons.title: Lesson 32 - Work & Business Basics
lessons.desc: Learn essential workplace and business vocabulary. Understand common professional terms.

lessons.title: Lesson 33 - Review & Work Life
lessons.desc: Review work-related actions and routines. Strengthen understanding of daily professional language.

lessons.title: Lesson 34 - Talking About the Past
lessons.desc: Learn words used to describe past events. Understand how time references work.

lessons.title: Lesson 35 - Talking About the Future
lessons.desc: Learn expressions related to future plans. Understand intention and possibility words.

lessons.title: Lesson 36 - Because / So / But
lessons.desc: Learn connectors for cause and contrast. Understand how ideas are linked.

lessons.title: Lesson 37 - If / Besides
lessons.desc: Learn conditional and additional expressions. Understand logical connections between ideas.

lessons.title: Lesson 38 - Review Conversation Skills
lessons.desc: Review verbs used in conversations. Strengthen understanding of interaction skills.

lessons.title: Lesson 39 - Meeting New People
lessons.desc: Understand basic introduction conversations. Recognize common greeting exchanges.

lessons.title: Lesson 40 - Talking About Daily Life
lessons.desc: Understand sentences about daily routines. Recognize everyday life conversations.

lessons.title: Lesson 41 - Shopping Sentences
lessons.desc: Understand common shopping conversations. Recognize buying and payment expressions.

lessons.title: Lesson 42 - In a Restaurant
lessons.desc: Understand full dining conversations. Recognize ordering and service expressions.

lessons.title: Lesson 43 - Asking for Directions
lessons.desc: Understand how directions are given. Recognize location-based conversations.

lessons.title: Lesson 44 - Travel Sentences
lessons.desc: Understand travel-related conversations. Recognize transportation and accommodation sentences.

lessons.title: Lesson 45 - Emergency Sentences
lessons.desc: Understand urgent and emergency conversations. Recognize safety-related expressions.

lessons.title: Lesson 46 - Everyday Small Talk
lessons.desc: Understand casual daily conversations. Recognize friendly and social expressions.
